name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Repeet - translate and learn with flashcards

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate and save words and phrases while browsing the web, then practice your language sets using flashcards on the phone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn browsing into learning with Repeet! 🌐 Instantly translate words and phrases while you surf the web, then practice them with flashcards Repeet app. 📱

Download now and start building your vocabulary today! 👉 www.repeet.app

Key features of REPEET:

🌐 Select and translate text on web pages just like Google Translate
🌟 Save translated words and phrases into personalized sets
📚 Create flashcards by typing directly into a pop-up window in your browser's menu bar
📲 Install the Repeet mobile app to practice your words with flashcards, even offline
🔊 Practice proper pronunciation with the Text-to-Speech feature
📚 Organize your phrases your way—by language, topic, or any system you prefer
🔢 Choose the best translation from multiple options
✏️ Edit translations or add your own text to your flashcards
🔄 Enjoy seamless synchronization between the Repeet browser extension and mobile app

With Repeet, you can learn at your own pace and improve your skills on the go. 🚶 Don’t miss the chance to learn efficiently—download the app now and start your learning journey today! 👉 www.repeet.app 🌍
